text: Allah abatarana karechena srestha bibrti -- ekakhana grantha, subin'yasta, punarabrttimaya, ete yara tadera prabhuke bhaya kare tadera camara si'ure othe, tarapara tadera chala o tadera dila narama haya allahâ€Œra smarane. Eti'i allahâ€Œra patha-nirdesa, era dbara tini patha dekhiye thakena yake tini iccha karena. Yake allah pathabhrasta hate dena, tara jan'ya tabe hedayatakaridera ke'u ne'i.
